SEARCH
Package communications

Class ServerManager

java.lang.Object
communications.ServerManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
class ServerManager extends Object implements Runnable
A class to manage a server that listens for incoming connections on a given port and delegates them to a ConnectionController.
Author:
Miquel A. Fuster

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private boolean
    alive
    A flag to indicate if the server is currently running.

    controller
    The ConnectionController that will handle incoming connections.
    private static final Logger
    LOGGER
    The logger for this class.
    private ServerSocket
    serverSocket
    The ServerSocket that the server will listen on for incoming connections.

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerManager

      public ServerManager(ConnectionController controller, int serverPort) throws IOException
      Constructs a ServerManager with a given ConnectionController and server port.
      Parameters:
      controller - the ConnectionController that will handle incoming connections
      serverPort - the port that the server will listen on for incoming connections
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs when opening the server socket
